meta.description: Weekly recurring task calendar for Stay Productive app

tasks.title: DevOps video 25-40 min + practice + notes
tasks.description: Watch a focused DevOps tutorial, replicate the steps in your lab, and take notes on key commands or pitfalls.

tasks.title: AI news scan 15-20 min → add to directory → draft post ideas
tasks.description: Quickly check feeds for new AI tools or agentic workflow updates. Add interesting ones to your directory and think of content ideas.

tasks.title: Plan main project/automation focus for the week
tasks.description: Define the specific n8n automation or SaaS feature you will complete by Sunday. Set clear milestones.

tasks.title: Review post ideas → schedule posts for week
tasks.description: Look at your idea backlog. Schedule at least 3 posts across X, LinkedIn, or Medium for the upcoming days.

tasks.title: X/Reddit engagement (2-3 replies)
tasks.description: Reply thoughtfully to current discussions in the DevOps, AI, or SaaS communities to build presence.

tasks.title: Project work (n8n / SaaS) 1-2h
tasks.description: Deep work session on your primary project. Focus on logic building or UI implementation.

tasks.title: Push updates to GitHub
tasks.description: Commit your changes with clear messages. Maintain your streak and version history.

tasks.title: Draft X/Medium post from project progress
tasks.description: Share a screenshot or a lesson learned from today's build. Real-time building attracts more interest.

tasks.title: AI tool test → notes/mini review
tasks.description: Pick one tool from your scans. Test it for 10 minutes and write a quick pros/cons note.

tasks.title: X/Reddit engagement (2-3 replies)
tasks.description: Provide value in comment sections. Help people solve problems related to automation or DevOps.

tasks.title: DevOps video 25-40 min + practice + notes
tasks.description: Continue your learning path. Focus on practical implementation of infrastructure as code or CI/CD.

tasks.title: Run lead collection automation + manual leads
tasks.description: Trigger your lead scrapers and spend 15 minutes manually finding high-quality freelance leads.

tasks.title: Send 3-5 proposals
tasks.description: Write personalized proposals for the leads found. Focus on showcasing your automation expertise.

tasks.title: Engage online: reply 2-3 X/Reddit posts
tasks.description: Maintain consistency in engagement. Look for people asking for automation or freelance help.

tasks.title: Continue project (n8n / SaaS)
tasks.description: Keep the momentum. Fix bugs or start the next sub-feature planned on Monday.

tasks.title: GitHub push
tasks.description: Daily commit. Ensure your repo reflects today's progress.

tasks.title: Draft project-based post
tasks.description: Create a thread or post about a specific technical challenge you solved in your project today.

tasks.title: Optional AI tool practice
tasks.description: If you have extra energy, dive deeper into a new AI agent framework or automation node.

tasks.title: X/Reddit engagement (2-3 replies)
tasks.description: Strengthen relationships by replying to key influencers or active community members.

tasks.title: DevOps video + practice + notes
tasks.description: Wrap up the week's learning module. Ensure you can explain the core concept without looking at notes.

tasks.title: Weekly reflection draft (post/blog)
tasks.description: Use the auto-generated summary to write a "Week in Review" post. Highlight wins and lessons.

tasks.title: Portfolio update
tasks.description: Add a new project screenshot, update a description, or refine a skill tag in your portfolio.

tasks.title: Freelance follow-ups
tasks.description: Ping leads from Monday/Wednesday if they haven't replied. Be professional and brief.

tasks.title: X/Reddit engagement (2-3 replies)
tasks.description: Final engagement pulse for the work week.

tasks.title: Send 3-5 proposals
tasks.description: Batch process new opportunities for the coming week while competition is lower.

tasks.title: Review/tag leads
tasks.description: Organize your CRM. Tag leads by potential value and niche for easier follow-ups.

tasks.title: Optional small project tweaks
tasks.description: Do the non-essential but nice-to-have polishing on your projects.

tasks.title: Quick post/learning snippet
tasks.description: Share a Saturday thought or a quick tip you picked up during the week.

tasks.title: Check freelance messages
tasks.description: Quick scan of Upwork/LinkedIn for any urgent weekend inquiries.

tasks.title: Plan next week's focus
tasks.description: Come up with the main project idea for the week and prepare the necessary resources or tools.

tasks.title: AI news scan → add post ideas
tasks.description: Catch up on the latest AI trends and newsletters. Capture at least 2-3 content ideas for the week.

tasks.title: Portfolio check
tasks.description: Quickly review your portfolio link, check for dead links, and ensure your latest work is highlighted.

tasks.title: Optional light learning/side project
tasks.description: Dive into a new tool or minor project feature only if you feel inspired. No pressure.

tasks.title: Rest & recharge
tasks.description: Completely disconnect from work. Focus on recovery to maintain long-term momentum.
